title: RC-positivity, Schwarz's lemma and comparison theorems
authors: Zhiyao Xiong, Xiaokui Yang and Shing-Tung Yau
abstract:
It is well-known that the classical Schwarz lemma yields an explicit
comparison of two Hermitian metrics with uniform constant negative curvature
bounds through holomorphic maps between complex manifolds. In this paper, we
establish Schwarz lemmas for holomorphic bundle maps between abstract Hermitian
holomorphic vector bundles with various positive curvature bounds. As
applications, we prove Schwarz lemmas for holomorphic maps between complex
manifolds whose curvature tensors are described by the notion
``RC-positivity''. In particular, new diameter and volume comparison theorems
are obtained by using Schwarz lemmas.
